resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104278</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104278</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202745</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Oedipus the King: Personal Letter-Writing Assignment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ödipus der König: Persönliche 
Zeichen-Schreiben Anweisung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oedipe le roi : Affectation Personnelle de 
Lettre-Écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oedipus o rei: Atribuição Pessoal Da 
Letra-Escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oedipus il re: Assegnazione Personale Di 
Lettera-Scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Oedipus ο βασιλιάς: Προσωπική ανάθεση 
επιστολή-γραψίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oedipus el rey: Asignación Personal De la 
Carta-Escritura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will work in groups to evaluate the personality of various characters from "Oedipus the King". Each student will write two personal letters in the role of one character from the play responding to the events of the play and the various relationships within it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer arbeiten in den Gruppen, um die 
Funktionseigenschaft der verschiedenen Zeichen von "Ödipus 
auszuwerten der König". Jeder Kursteilnehmer schreibt zwei 
persönliche Briefe in die Rolle von einem Zeichen vom Spiel, das auf 
die Fälle des Spiels und die verschiedenen Verhältnisse innerhalb es
reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants travailleront dans les groupes pour
évaluer la personnalité de divers caractères de "Oedipe le roi". 
Chaque étudiant écrira deux lettres personnelles dans le rôle
d'un caractère du jeu répondant aux événements du jeu et aux 
divers rapports dans lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes trabalharão nos grupos para avaliar
a personalidade de vários caráteres de "Oedipus o rei". Cada 
estudante escreverá duas letras pessoais no papel de um caráter do 
jogo que responde aos eventos do jogo e aos vários relacionamentos 
dentro dele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi lavoreranno nei gruppi per valutare la
personalità di vari caratteri "da Oedipus il re". Ogni allievo 
scriverà due lettere personali nel ruolo di un carattere dal gioco 
che risponde agli eventi del gioco ed ai vari rapporti all'interno di 
esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εργαστούν κατά ομάδες για να 
αξιολογήσουν την προσωπικότητα των διάφορων χαρακτήρων από 
"Oedipus ο βασιλιάσ". Κάθε σπουδαστής θα γράψει δύο 
προσωπικά γράμματα στο ρόλο ενός χαρακτήρα από το παιχνίδι που 
αποκρίνεται στα γεγονότα του παιχνιδιού και τις διάφορες σχέσεις 
μέσα σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes trabajarán en grupos para evaluar
la personalidad de varios caracteres de "Oedipus el rey". Cada 
estudiante escribirá dos letras personales en el papel de un 
carácter del juego que responde a los acontecimientos del juego y a 
los varios lazos dentro de él.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GREG TOWNSEND
FN:GREG TOWNSEND
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202745</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104278</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
